channel.title: Help with C4D?
channel.description:
Okay, I downloaded the 43-day trail of C4D today, and after I finished my 1st model on it, I realised that I can't save. I just have two questions.
Is there any way to save the render on it? I'm new to the program so IDK.
How much does the ful version cost, or are there any cracked versions?
Thank you very much. BTW, I did google this, I can't find it anywere.

item.title: Help with C4D?
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

The core version is $995, the XL bundle version is $2,495, and the studio bundle is $3,695. Yes there are torrents.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with C4D?
item.dc:creator: @time_of_rune time of rune
item.description:
@time_of_rune wrote:

Thanks frell, can you help with the other question though?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with C4D?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Just use the print screen button or a screen capturer.

Read full topic
